impressionism.name: Impressionism
impressionism.characteristics: Outdoor painting (en plein air), broken color, visible brushwork, everyday scenes, effects of light and weather.
impressionism.description: Impressionists captured fleeting sensations of light and atmosphere using loose brushwork and high-key palettes. Subjects are often quotidian: gardens, rivers, leisure, city streets.
impressionism.emotional_connection: Your sense of calm and gentle optimism mirrors how Impressionists used light and color to evoke tranquil, reflective moods.

expressionism.name: Expressionism
expressionism.characteristics: Exaggerated color and form, psychological intensity, subjective distortion.
expressionism.description: Expressionists bent form and color to convey inner states, often unsettling or raw. Compositions feel urgent, jagged, emotionally charged.
expressionism.emotional_connection: The intensity you feel aligns with Expressionism’s strategy of using vivid, distorted imagery to relay raw emotion.

romanticism.name: Romanticism
romanticism.characteristics: Sublime nature, drama, storms, ruins, heightened emotion, lone figures in vast landscapes.
romanticism.description: Romantic painters sought the sublime—experiences of awe and dread—using dramatic atmospherics and poetic landscapes.
romanticism.emotional_connection: Feelings of awe, solitude, or wistfulness resonate with Romantic explorations of the human spirit in nature.

abstract_expressionism.name: Abstract Expressionism
abstract_expressionism.characteristics: Large scale, abstraction, action painting or color fields, emphasis on gesture or vast planes of color.
abstract_expressionism.description: Postwar artists in the US emphasized spontaneity, gesture, and inwardness—either through dynamic marks or meditative fields.
abstract_expressionism.emotional_connection: Your strong feelings—whether cathartic or contemplative—echo how these works channel emotion directly into paint.

surrealism.name: Surrealism
surrealism.characteristics: Dream logic, uncanny juxtapositions, subconscious imagery, hyperreal surfaces with illogical content.
surrealism.description: Surrealists revealed the subconscious through strange pairings and dreamlike spaces that destabilize everyday reality.
surrealism.emotional_connection: If the image feels puzzling or uncanny, that aligns with Surrealism’s fascination with the logic of dreams.

renaissance.name: Renaissance
renaissance.characteristics: Balance, harmony, naturalism, perspective, classical references, idealized figures.
renaissance.description: Renaissance art revived classical ideals and developed perspective for coherent, serene spaces and harmonized compositions.
renaissance.emotional_connection: Your feelings of balance and clarity match Renaissance ideals of proportion and calm rational order.

mannerism.name: Mannerism
mannerism.characteristics: Elongated proportions, artificial poses, complex compositions, heightened elegance.
mannerism.description: Mannerism pushed beyond Renaissance balance into stylized elegance and tension, with serpentine figures and strange spaces.
mannerism.emotional_connection: If the figures feel stretched, theatrical, or uneasy, your reaction dovetails with Mannerist artificiality.

baroque.name: Baroque
baroque.characteristics: Dramatic light, dynamic diagonals, theatricality, emotional immediacy.
baroque.description: Baroque painters used forceful contrasts and movement to pull viewers into scenes of spiritual and worldly drama.
baroque.emotional_connection: Your sense of drama and immediacy aligns with Baroque’s spotlight effects and vigorous motion.

rococo.name: Rococo
rococo.characteristics: Pastel palettes, playful intimacy, ornate decor, lighthearted mythologies.
rococo.description: Rococo favored airy color and flirtatious scenes, with a decorative elegance and whimsical grace.
rococo.emotional_connection: If you feel buoyant or charmed, this matches Rococo’s pastel lightness and social play.

neoclassicism.name: Neoclassicism
neoclassicism.characteristics: Clarity, moral seriousness, classical themes, linear precision.
neoclassicism.description: A return to antique virtues and clear design, often conveying civic duty and restraint.
neoclassicism.emotional_connection: If the image feels disciplined and lucid, your response echoes Neoclassicism’s moral clarity.

realism.name: Realism
realism.characteristics: Unidealized everyday life, social observation, frank depiction of labor and class.
realism.description: Realists confronted the present, depicting work, poverty, and ordinary life with solidity and gravity.
realism.emotional_connection: Your grounded or sober reaction relates to Realism’s commitment to the real world as it is.

post_impressionism.name: Post-Impressionism
post_impressionism.characteristics: Personalized color and structure; from Seurat’s system to Van Gogh’s emotion to Cézanne’s geometry.
post_impressionism.description: A diverse set of approaches extending Impressionism toward expressive color, structural order, or optical science.
post_impressionism.emotional_connection: If you sense both order and feeling, your response resonates with Post-Impressionist experimentation.

fauvism.name: Fauvism
fauvism.characteristics: Unnatural, saturated color, simplified forms, painterly directness.
fauvism.description: Fauves used color for emotional effect rather than description, creating radiant, upbeat scenes.
fauvism.emotional_connection: Bright joy and energy match Fauvism’s liberated palettes and bold simplifications.

cubism.name: Cubism
cubism.characteristics: Fragmented forms, multiple viewpoints, shallow space, subdued palettes (Analytic) or collage (Synthetic).
cubism.description: Cubists deconstructed objects into facets, exploring perception and time within a single image.
cubism.emotional_connection: If the image feels analytical or fractured, your response parallels Cubism’s multi-perspective logic.

futurism.name: Futurism
futurism.characteristics: Speed, dynamism, mechanization, motion blur, urban modernity.
futurism.description: Futurists celebrated velocity and technology, slicing forms into rhythmic vectors.
futurism.emotional_connection: A rush of energy or urban excitement aligns with Futurism’s devotion to motion.

dada.name: Dada
dada.characteristics: Anti-art gestures, absurdity, chance, readymades, collage and photomontage.
dada.description: Dada mocked conventional meaning, embracing nonsense and shock to critique society.
dada.emotional_connection: If you feel puzzled or amused by arbitrariness, that’s Dada’s subversive spirit at work.

constructivism.name: Constructivism
constructivism.characteristics: Industrial materials, geometric order, utilitarian design, political posters.
constructivism.description: Constructivists fused art and engineering to build a new visual language for a modern society.
constructivism.emotional_connection: If you sense engineered clarity and activist energy, this maps to Constructivist ideals.

suprematism.name: Suprematism
suprematism.characteristics: Pure geometric forms, spiritual abstraction, limited palettes.
suprematism.description: Suprematism sought pure feeling through non-objective shapes—squares, circles, and crosses.
suprematism.emotional_connection: Quiet focus on simple shapes can evoke the inwardness of Suprematist works.

symbolism.name: Symbolism
symbolism.characteristics: Mythic, dreamlike allegory; poetic, often dark themes; personal iconography.
symbolism.description: Symbolists explored inner visions and moods through veiled narratives and emblematic imagery.
symbolism.emotional_connection: If the image feels poetic or otherworldly, your response echoes Symbolist inwardness.

art_nouveau.name: Art Nouveau
art_nouveau.characteristics: Sinuous lines, floral motifs, decorative integration of art and design.
art_nouveau.description: Art Nouveau merged fine art and ornament through organic lines and sensual patterning.
art_nouveau.emotional_connection: Delight in elegant curves and decorative rhythm aligns with Art Nouveau’s sensibility.

art_deco.name: Art Deco
art_deco.characteristics: Streamlined geometry, luxe materials, sunbursts, zigzags, glamour.
art_deco.description: Art Deco fused modern sleekness with opulence, celebrating progress and style.
art_deco.emotional_connection: If it feels stylish and confident, that matches Art Deco’s chic geometry.

minimalism.name: Minimalism
minimalism.characteristics: Extreme reduction, industrial materials, repeated units, impersonality.
minimalism.description: Minimalism strips art to essentials, making viewers attend to space, light, and surface.
minimalism.emotional_connection: If you feel quiet focus or neutrality, you align with Minimalism’s pared-back clarity.

pop_art.name: Pop Art
pop_art.characteristics: Mass media imagery, bright commercial palettes, irony and wit.
pop_art.description: Pop Art recontextualized consumer culture, flattening high/low boundaries with punchy graphics.
pop_art.emotional_connection: If bold, cheeky imagery feels fun or buzzy, that’s Pop’s consumer poptimism.

op_art.name: Op Art
op_art.characteristics: Optical vibrations, moiré patterns, illusions of movement.
op_art.description: Op Art provokes the eye with precise patterns that seem to pulse or shift.
op_art.emotional_connection: A buzzing or dizzy feel aligns with Op Art’s optical games.

conceptual_art.name: Conceptual Art
conceptual_art.characteristics: Idea prioritized over object; text pieces, instructions, documentation.
conceptual_art.description: Conceptual Art asserts that the concept is the artwork; materials are secondary.
conceptual_art.emotional_connection: If you’re led to think more than feel, this mirrors Conceptualism’s cerebral focus.

photorealism.name: Photorealism
photorealism.characteristics: Meticulous, camera-like detail; everyday subjects; reflective surfaces.
photorealism.description: Photorealists painted from photos with extraordinary fidelity, emphasizing surface and light.
photorealism.emotional_connection: A cool, observational mood maps to Photorealism’s clinical precision.

color_field.name: Color Field Painting
color_field.characteristics: Broad, unmodulated expanses of color; immersive, meditative surfaces.
color_field.description: Color Field painters used large areas of color to evoke inner states and quiet grandeur.
color_field.emotional_connection: If you feel hushed or absorbed by color, this aligns with Color Field sensibilities.

neo_expressionism.name: Neo-Expressionism
neo_expressionism.characteristics: Figurative return with raw paint, graffiti impulses, mythic or personal symbols.
neo_expressionism.description: Late-20th-century revival of gestural intensity and emotive figuration.
neo_expressionism.emotional_connection: If you sense ferocity and scrawl, your reaction mirrors Neo-Expressionist urgency.

street_art.name: Street Art / Graffiti
street_art.characteristics: Public walls, stencils, tags, murals; political or pop imagery; bold graphics.
street_art.description: Street art engages public space with graphic immediacy and cultural critique.
street_art.emotional_connection: If it feels punchy, direct, or activist, that aligns with street visual language.

bauhaus_destijl.name: Bauhaus / De Stijl
bauhaus_destijl.characteristics: Reduction to primary colors and basic forms; unity of art, craft, architecture.
bauhaus_destijl.description: These movements pursued universal harmony through grids, modules, and primary palettes.
bauhaus_destijl.emotional_connection: If simple shapes and structure feel serene, you align with this rational idealism.

ukiyo_e.name: Ukiyo-e
ukiyo_e.characteristics: Japanese woodblock prints; flattened space, bold outlines, patterned color fields.
ukiyo_e.description: Ukiyo-e images of landscapes, theater, and daily life use stylized line and color.
ukiyo_e.emotional_connection: If you feel serene clarity with decorative rhythm, that echoes Ukiyo-e aesthetics.

ink_painting.name: East Asian Ink Painting
ink_painting.characteristics: Brush-and-ink on paper/silk; calligraphic strokes; atmospheric emptiness.
ink_painting.description: Ink traditions emphasize gesture and void, suggesting mountains, water, and spirit through economy.
ink_painting.emotional_connection: Quiet, meditative feelings align with the breathing space of ink painting.

contemporary_figurative.name: Contemporary Figurative
contemporary_figurative.characteristics: Renewed figuration with diverse styles: realism to stylized, often narrative or identity-focused.
contemporary_figurative.description: Current figurative art blends historical references with personal and social narratives.
contemporary_figurative.emotional_connection: If portraits feel psychologically charged or culturally specific, that fits contemporary figuration.

digital_generative.name: Digital / Generative Art
digital_generative.characteristics: Algorithmic forms, plotter lines, procedural textures, screen-native color.
digital_generative.description: Digital and generative artists use code and systems to create complex visual structures.
digital_generative.emotional_connection: If you feel fascinated by pattern logic or data-like textures, that maps here.
